DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to learn about the effects of long term carnitine use in patients with metabolic disorders and its potential relationship to cardiovascular events.
DOC.brief_title: Survey on Cardiovascular Events in Patients With Metabolic Disease on Chronic Carnitine Supplementation
DOC.detailed_description: This online cross-sectional survey will examine the self-reported long-term carnitine use in patients with metabolic disorders and any potential relationship to cardiovascular events.
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of mitochondrial disease or any other metabolic disorder Any age group NAMDC or RDCRN registry participant Inability to provide informed consent and complete survey Lack of participation in NAMDC or RDCRN registry
